title: The Mirror Shop: Love and loss in the world of antiques
description: Luke, a mirror dealer, leads a safe existence in a market town surrounded by the English countryside.On the surface he and his long-term partner, Eva, a psychotherapist, seem happy.But when a younger woman enters his shop past history breaks through the tranquil surface of their lives, leading Luke to a world where murder is his only option.
author: Nicholas Bundock
